name: Food Empire - Merge, Inc.
description:
"Food" is an uncountable noun. Perhaps because one is never enough!
In Food Empire, food will always pop up out of nowhere!
You need to free up some space for another food by merging the same type of food to discover new ones. Watch (and merge) as your pantry grow with more and more wonderful food!
Just like on a real restaurant, the higher your food level is, the more money you can get. It's a no-brainer game, enjoyable for kids and adults alike.

As an owner of a restaurant, your job doesn't stop there! Don't forget to make your restaurant even better by upgrading your serving time, food level, and many more.
After all, happiness is best shared with food!

Go on, play and let us know your thought or your favorite recipes via info@alegrium.com!
